titleStmt.title: The temporysour (that is to saye: the obseruer of tyme, or he that chaungeth with the tyme.) Compyled in Latyn by the excellent clarke Wolfangus Musculus, and tra[n]slated into Frenche by M. Vallerain Pullain. And out of Frenche into Inglishe by R.P. 1555.
titleStmt.author: Musculus, Wolfgang, 1497-1563.

titleStmt.title: The temporysour (that is to saye: the obseruer of tyme, or he that chaungeth with the tyme.) Compyled in Latyn by the excellent clarke Wolfangus Musculus, and tra[n]slated into Frenche by M. Vallerain Pullain. And out of Frenche into Inglishe by R.P. 1555.
titleStmt.author: Musculus, Wolfgang, 1497-1563.
Poullain, Valérand, d. 1559 or 60.
Pownall, Robert, 1520-1571.
Curione, Celio Secondo, 1503-1569. Excellent admonicion and resolution, of the godlye and famous learned man Celius secundus Curio. aut

publicationStmt.date: Anno Domini. 1555. In the month of July. [1555]

notesStmt.note: Place of publication and printer's name conjectured by STC.
Includes: An excellent admonicion and resolution, of the godlye and famous learned man Celius secundus Curio, from a letter in an unidentified work of Celio Secundus Curione.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
